name: online-borrow-service
description:
Online Borrow Service

Project Overview

This project is a way for me to demonstrate what I've learned so far as a frontend developer. After completing the Codecool course, I started developing this project based on an idea that had inspired me earlier.

Purpose

The goal of this project is to show my growing skills in frontend development and my ability to create useful, user-friendly applications.
author: Arpad Varga
